title: Entertainment Marketing Manager
content:
OVERVIEW:Are you our next Entertainment Marketing Manager ? This role exists to manage talent & EM initiatives that will grow Gymshark into the most culturally relevant fitness brand by positioning and integrating the brand into youth culture through Talent, Activations, Product Placement, Media & Content.
WHAT YOU'LL BE DOING:

This role leads on the management, optimisation & growth of Gymshark's UK and International Entertainment Marketing team which includes such initiatives as; both paid & organic celebrity & talent endorsements, Influencer Activations, Micro Influencer Program, Cultural Activations & Product Placement.
You will be responsible for implementing & executing the INT Entertainment Marketing strategy that will speak to Fashion x Fitness & Youth Tribe cohorts of the Gymshark consumer, delivering Excitement & growth in the local markets in line with the Global strategy.
Responsible for documenting spend within Entertainment Marketing regional budget.
Responsible for managing relationships & activating Gymshark‚Äôs Tier 0 & Tier 1 Talent.
Responsible for building & delivering seasonal EM gifting and activations calendar for the local markets we operate in, working with GTM teams to provide creative concepts to meet brand KPI‚Äôs ‚Äì Excitement & Belonging.
You will be responsible for overseeing campaigns, working with your team to produce creative concepts & ideas that enable us to utilize the network to support and amplify campaigns.
Developing and maintaining relationships with Talent, Management, Music Labels, Networks, and Agencies in the UK.
Negotiate new contracts and contract renewals.
Plan, develop and execute Annual and Quarterly Talent, Activation & Campaign strategies by partnering with GTM teams that support wider brand and product moments & initiatives as well as integrating Gymshark into Cultural key moments.
In this position you‚Äôre responsible for your team and their personal development. You will also be responsible for their day-to-day work tasks and creating clear development plans supported by quarterly & annual objectives and KPIs.

WHAT YOU'LL NEED:Essential Criteria:

Accountability: Prepare a road map for entertainment marketing success, ensure all are clear, and take action to keep progress on track. Assume responsibility for actions and outcomes.
Adaptability: Embrace change and help others adjust. Modify approach according to context. Actively seek to become comfortable in new environments.
Collaborative Leadership: Share expertise and resources to help others. Include all who can contribute to a successful outcome.
Communication: Craft clear and detailed communications with talent and their representation. Internally, share information and ideas with stakeholders and cross-functional teams and listen openly. To go further, we go together.
Innovation: Create solutions to challenges and positively question current thinking. Leverage logic and rationale to influence. Recognise and build on the ideas of others.
Decision-making: Establish criteria. Seek relevant information to aid understanding. Identify correlation. Determine causation. Arbitrate with balanced, compelling resolutions.
Strong commitment to achieving excellence in the Influencer & Entertainment space.
Understands fashion, music, lifestyle, pop culture and is ingrained in social media scene and trends
Ability to create successful entertainment marketing outcomes based on business goals and strategies
Ability to manage and prioritise multiple high-profile projects simultaneously
Thrives in fast-paced environment with tight deadlines
Able to plan strategically and react tactically based on real-time data, business performance and opportunities to capitalize upon
Strong leadership and communication skills
3+ years experience in Influencer Marketing, PR & Comms or Entertainment Marketing.

WHAT YOU COULD ALSO HAVE:

Storytelling
Leading change
Lateral thinker
Willing to challenge and be challenged
Willingness to give and receive effective feedback
Willing to adapt to change.
Solutions orientated.
Strong relationship skills

This is a hybrid role and would require the successful candidate to attend at least 3 days a week in GSLQ, London or Solihull GSHQ 
CLOSING DATE: Friday 24th November, 2023
BELONGING AT GYMSHARK.
Our mission is to be a place where everyone belongs. We‚Äôre an equal opportunities employer, and for us that means we always strive to be as inclusive as possible in all aspects of employment, right from your application. We‚Äôre committed to finding reasonable adjustments* for candidates with specific needs or have a disability during our recruitment process, and all applicants will be considered fairly and equally. We do not tolerate discrimination of any kind. *If you‚Äôd like to request a reasonable adjustment please email talent@gymshark.com. 
ABOUT US.
We‚Äôre here to unite the conditioning community. We believe that putting the sweat in today, prepares us for tomorrow. So, we give people the tools they need to reach further, go faster, be stronger. We celebrate those who show up ‚Äì for themselves ‚Äì to be their physical or mental best, whatever that means for them. It‚Äôs what we want for our community, and our team. A team that‚Äôs growing rapidly around the world. A collective of talented individuals working together to invent Gymshark‚Äôs future. Our plans are ambitious, and we‚Äôre looking for people who want to join us for the ride ‚Äì our growth will be your growth.
THE PERKS.
üôå Competitive ‚ÄòWin Together, Lose Together‚Äô Bonusü©∫ Choice of Private Medical Insurance or Healthcare Cash Plan, paid for by us!üèñ 25 days holidays + your birthday and all the Bank Holidays which can be substituted and taken whenever you want.üíª A truly Flexible Working Cultureüë• A collaborative, creative and inspiring working environmentüí∞ Employer pension contributions up to 7%ü§© Life Assurance at four times your basic salaryü¶à 50% Gymshark DiscountüéÅ Gymshark Gift Card for each year of serviceü•á Financial, Physical and Mental Wellbeing Supportüìö Great Training and Learning Resourcesüñ• Choice of hardware and access to the best softwareü§í Paid time off when you‚Äôre physically and mentally unwellüß∏ Very Generous Family Leave package ‚Äì we support you extending your familyüçé Refuel - Healthy fresh food at GSHQüèãÔ∏è‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è Lifting Club (LC) Gym Membershipüëâ Free monthly massagesüíà Beauty and Barber facilitiesüöò Free on-site parking

questions.label: Have you fully read and understood the job description?
What are your salary expectations (per annum) for this role?
Based on the job description, do you hold any additional skills, knowledge, and experience from your career to date that you feel are relevant for this role? Please provide details (500 words max)
Are there any skills or knowledge gaps you can identify from the job description that you would need support on? If so, please highlight. (500 words max)
Tell us: Why Gymshark? Why this job? And why you?
What is your current notice period?

questions.description: Legally, we have to verify your Right to Work in the UK before you can start work with us. We're asking for this information now so we know what type of right to work check we need to do later on in the process. Your answer to this question won't affect the outcome of your application, unless you need visa sponsorship and are applying for a role that we can't sponsor.
questions.label: Please confirm your UK Right to Work status.

values.label: I'm a UK or Irish National.
I'm an EU, EEA, or Swiss National with status under the EU Settlement Scheme.
I've got another type of visa, which gives me permanent right to work in the UK.
I've got another type of visa, which gives me temporary right to work in the UK.
I have visa sponsorship from another company, which gives me the right to work in the UK but, would need visa sponsorship to work for Gymshark.
I don't have the right to work in the UK and would need visa sponsorship to work for Gymshark.

questions.description:
‚úÖ Disability Confident Committed 

We’re proud to be a Disability Confident Committed employer and want to encourage anyone with a disability to apply for a role at Gymshark. We offer an interview to candidates with disabilities or long-term conditions who meet the minimum criteria for the role. 

Please let us know below if would you like to apply through the Disability Confident scheme.

values.label: Yes, I want to apply through the Disability Confident scheme
